articles.title: Russian forces seize huge Ukrainian nuclear plant, fire extinguished - Reuters
articles.description: Russian forces seized the largest nuclear power plant in Europe after a building at the complex was set ablaze during intense fighting with Ukrainian defenders, Ukrainian authorities said on Friday.
